tweet.html: RT @FSIatState: Starting next week, we’re launching a new series featuring historical facts from @HistoryAtState, old stories, @ADSTnews's oral histories, and archives about FSI’s past to give insight into our diplomatic training history. #FSIFlashbackFriday. pic.twitter.com/ZmukpTdTti
